text: Walter Hoyland (14 August 1901–1985) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Fulham, Mansfield Town and Sheffield United. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1985 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:English Football League players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Fulham F.C. players Category:Boston Town F.C. title: Walter Hoyland
